name: engineerflix
description: A Netflix-style platform for discovering and hiring engineering talent

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules .next && cd ../backend && rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean:install && npm run dev
